raw_mentions:
Here are the extracted sentences that meet the criteria:


The binding assay of human NKIR expressed in either COS or CHO cells is based on the use of 125l-substance P (125I-SP, from DU PONT, Boston, MA) as a radioactively labeled ligand which competes with unlabeled substance P or any other ligand for binding to the human NKIR, with a concentration of 1.5 to 2.5 nM of 125I-SP.
Substance P is added to the well at final concentration of 0.3 nM to activate the human NKIR.
